room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Killer" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: I’ve done nearly 10 rooms and the two current rooms at The Box are by far in my top three favorites (especially the Cold Case Killer!) The story lines are interesting and keep you highly engaged. What truly sets them apart is Andy, who runs the front and acts as the “room master.” He is in character from the moment you walk in the building; he builds up the excitement and sets the scene to keep you on edge the whole time. Highly recommend checking this place out, you will not regret it!

room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Killer" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: Had so much fun. I did the cold case will be back to do the ventriloquist.

room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Killer" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: Been to almost every escape room and this was by far one of the best experiences! The staff was very professional and made the experience worth coming back for a second time. The room Cold Case killer was definitely fun and challenging. Definitely need to think outside of the box. Will be back again to do the Vantriloquist room!

room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Killer" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: I completed Cold Case Killer with three friends last weekend and I can't stop thinking about it! I've never been to an escape room that has such an amazing story. It certainly stays with you afterwards. The puzzles were great and our host, Andy was absolutely charming and engaging.

room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Killer" by The Box Escape Experience in Charlotte
review: Had a fantastic time in the Cold Case Killer room. Be sure to read the case files before you arrive! Easily my favorite story of any of the 10 or so escape rooms I've done so far.Andy did a great job of setting the scene before we entered and answering our questions afterwards.
